meta.job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) Acute Care Specialty

duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver patient-centered nursing care in accordance with standards of care.
Systematically evaluate the quality and effectiveness of nursing practice.
Acquire and maintain current knowledge in nursing practice and education.
Collaborate with patients, significant others, and healthcare providers in providing and advocating for patient care.
Consider safety and cost-effectiveness when delivering patient care.
Secure, administer, and handle medication according to established guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Current Licensure in the State of Kansas as a Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN)
Graduate of an accredited school of licensed practical nursing
